remarks: The composition of two motions is a motion.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Dec-2019.)
statement:
ismot.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
ismot.m $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
motgrp.1 $e |- ( ph -> G e. V ) $.
motco.2 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( G Ismt G ) ) $.
motco.3 $e |- ( ph -> H e. ( G Ismt G ) ) $.
motco $p |- ( ph -> ( F o. H ) e. ( G Ismt G ) ) $.
